about_the_game:
Special package for Halloween with special price!

Included


  • Gold Premium (7 days) 1EA : Get in-game premium service! (Additional EXP, Rare Drop, Additional Consumable items!)
  • Inventory Expand 1EA : Expand your character's Inventory.
  • Amp-Device 500EA : Use Amp-Device to empower your firepower!
  • Emergency Netowrk 20 EA : Broadcast your chatting with special chat window!
  • Greater Elixir 50 EA : Restore HP/SD by 100% with special potion.
  • Bear Doll Giftbox 3EA : Get your cute bear doll avatar from giftbox!
  • Rabit Doll Giftbox 3EA : Get your cute rabit doll avatar from giftbox!
